title: Used To And Be Used To

questions.question: I am not used to ............................. late hours.
questions.description: The to in be used to is a preposition. We use ing forms after prepositions.

questions.question: He used to ............................. a lot.
questions.description: We use an infinitive after used to.

questions.question: I used to ………………………… pop music, but now I don’t.
questions.description: We use an infinitive after used to.

questions.question: When we were children, we used to ………………………… a lot of time playing hide and seek.
questions.description: We use an infinitive after used to.

questions.question: I …………………………… be afraid of spiders.
questions.description: We use used to to talk about things that happened at an earlier stage of our life.

questions.question: You used not to eat meat, ………………………….?
questions.description: Used is not used in questions tags. Instead we use did.

questions.question: When I was in Mumbai, I ………………………….. visit my grandparents every month.
questions.description: We use used to to talk about things that happened at an earlier stage of our life.

questions.question: I ………………………… my grandparents twice last month.
questions.description: We do not use used to to simply say how many times something happened.

questions.question: I ……………………………….  a big car, but now I do.
questions.description: We use didn’t use to to talk about something we hadn’t done in the past.

questions.question: I …………………………………… a big car so I was scared.
questions.description: If you aren’t used to doing something, it is not familiar to you.

questions.question: It took me quite some time to get used to ………………………….. in a big city.
questions.description: We use an ing form after get used to.

questions.question: Little by little, she …………………………….. her new family.
